verses.verse: Paul, <S%G3972><s%> a servant <S%G1401><s%> of God, <S%G2316><s%> and <S%G1161><s%> an apostle <S%G652><s%> of Jesus <S%G2424><s%> Christ, <S%G5547><s%> according <S%G2596><s%> to the faith <S%G4102><s%> of God's <S%G2316><s%> elect, <S%G1588><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> the acknowledging <S%G1922><s%> of the truth <S%G225><s%> which <S%G3588><s%> is after <S%G2596><s%> godliness; <S%G2150><s%>

In <S%G1909><s%> hope <S%G1680><s%> of eternal <S%G166><s%> life, <S%G2222><s%> which <S%G3739><s%> God, <S%G2316><s%> that cannot lie, <S%G893><s%> promised <S%G1861><s%> before <S%G4253><s%> the world began; <S%G166><s%> <S%G5550><s%>

But <S%G1161><s%> hath in due <S%G2398><s%> times <S%G2540><s%> manifested <S%G5319><s%> his <S%G848><s%> word <S%G3056><s%> through <S%G1722><s%> preaching, <S%G2782><s%> which <S%G3739><s%> is committed <S%G4100><s%> unto me <S%G1473><s%> according <S%G2596><s%> to the commandment <S%G2003><s%> of God <S%G2316><s%> our <S%G2257><s%> Savior; <S%G4990><s%>

To Titus, <S%G5103><s%> mine own <S%G1103><s%> son <S%G5043><s%> after <S%G2596><s%> the common <S%G2839><s%> faith: <S%G4102><s%> Grace, <S%G5485><s%> mercy, <S%G1656><s%> and peace, <S%G1515><s%> from <S%G575><s%> God <S%G2316><s%> the Father <S%G3962><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> the Lord <S%G2962><s%> Jesus <S%G2424><s%> Christ <S%G5547><s%> our <S%G2257><s%> Savior. <S%G4990><s%>

For this cause <S%G5484><s%> <S%G5127><s%> left <S%G2641><s%> I thee <S%G4571><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> Crete, <S%G2914><s%> that <S%G2443><s%> thou shouldest set in order <S%G1930><s%> the things that are wanting, <S%G3007><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> ordain <S%G2525><s%> elders <S%G4245><s%> in every city, <S%G2596><s%> <S%G4172><s%> as <S%G5613><s%> I <S%G1473><s%> had appointed <S%G1299><s%> thee: <S%G4671><s%>

If any <S%G1536><s%> be <S%G2076><s%> blameless, <S%G410><s%> the husband <S%G435><s%> of one <S%G3391><s%> wife, <S%G1135><s%> having <S%G2192><s%> faithful <S%G4103><s%> children <S%G5043><s%> not <S%G3361><s%> accused <S%G1722><s%> <S%G2724><s%> of riot <S%G810><s%> or <S%G2228><s%> unruly. <S%G506><s%>

For <S%G1063><s%> a bishop <S%G1985><s%> must <S%G1163><s%> be <S%G1511><s%> blameless, <S%G410><s%> as <S%G5613><s%> the steward <S%G3623><s%> of God; <S%G2316><s%> not <S%G3361><s%> self-willed, <S%G829><s%> not <S%G3361><s%> soon angry, <S%G3711><s%> not <S%G3361><s%> given to wine, <S%G3943><s%> no <S%G3361><s%> striker, <S%G4131><s%> not <S%G3361><s%> given to filthy lucre; <S%G146><s%>
But <S%G235><s%> a lover of hospitality, <S%G5382><s%> a lover of good men, <S%G5358><s%> sober, <S%G4998><s%> just, <S%G1342><s%> holy, <S%G3741><s%> temperate; <S%G1468><s%>

Holding fast <S%G472><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> faithful <S%G4103><s%> word <S%G3056><s%> as he hath been taught, <S%G2596><s%> <S%G1322><s%> that <S%G2443><s%> he may be <S%G5600><s%> able <S%G1415><s%> by <S%G1722><s%> sound <S%G5198><s%> doctrine <S%G1319><s%> both <S%G2532><s%> to exhort <S%G3870><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> to convince <S%G1651><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> gainsayers. <S%G483><s%>

For <S%G1063><s%> there are <S%G1526><s%> many <S%G4183><s%> unruly <S%G2532><s%> <S%G506><s%> and vain talkers <S%G3151><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> deceivers, <S%G5423><s%> especially <S%G3122><s%> they <S%G3588><s%> of <S%G1537><s%> the circumcision: <S%G4061><s%>

Whose <S%G3739><s%> mouths must be stopped, <S%G1993><s%> <S%G1163><s%> who <S%G3748><s%> subvert <S%G396><s%> whole <S%G3650><s%> houses, <S%G3624><s%> teaching <S%G1321><s%> things which <S%G3739><s%> they ought <S%G1163><s%> not, <S%G3361><s%> for filthy lucre's sake. <S%G5484><s%> <S%G150><s%> <S%G2771><s%>

One <S%G5100><s%> of <S%G1537><s%> themselves, <S%G846><s%> even a prophet <S%G4396><s%> of their <S%G846><s%> own, <S%G2398><s%> said, <S%G2036><s%> The Cretians <S%G2912><s%> are always <S%G104><s%> liars, <S%G5583><s%> evil <S%G2556><s%> beasts, <S%G2342><s%> slow <S%G692><s%> bellies. <S%G1064><s%>

This <S%G3778><s%> witness <S%G3141><s%> is <S%G2076><s%> true. <S%G227><s%> Wherefore <S%G1223><s%> <S%G3739><s%> <S%G156><s%> rebuke <S%G1651><s%> them <S%G846><s%> sharply, <S%G664><s%> that <S%G2443><s%> they may be sound <S%G5198><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> faith; <S%G4102><s%>

Not <S%G3361><s%> giving heed <S%G4337><s%> to Jewish <S%G2451><s%> fables, <S%G3454><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> commandments <S%G1785><s%> of men, <S%G444><s%> that turn from <S%G654><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> truth. <S%G225><s%>

Unto the <S%G3588><s%> pure <S%G2513><s%> all things <S%G3956><s%> are <S%G3303><s%> pure: <S%G2513><s%> but <S%G1161><s%> unto them <S%G3588><s%> that are defiled <S%G3392><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> unbelieving <S%G571><s%> is nothing <S%G3762><s%> pure; <S%G2513><s%> but <S%G235><s%> even <S%G2532><s%> their <S%G846><s%> mind <S%G3563><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> conscience <S%G4893><s%> is defiled. <S%G3392><s%>

They profess <S%G3670><s%> that they know <S%G1492><s%> God; <S%G2316><s%> but <S%G1161><s%> in works <S%G2041><s%> they deny <S%G720><s%> him, being <S%G5607><s%> abominable, <S%G947><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> disobedient, <S%G545><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> unto <S%G4314><s%> every <S%G3956><s%> good <S%G18><s%> work <S%G2041><s%> reprobate. <S%G96><s%>
